mapper.insert: insert into book values(book_id_seq.nextval, #{laundryId}, #{userId}, systimestamp, #{bookMemo}, #{bookMethodId}, #{bookTotalFee}, systimestamp)
mapper.select: select b.book_Id, b.user_id, b.book_Count, b.book_Insert_Date, b.book_Update_Date, b.book_Memo, b.book_Total_Fee, bs.book_state_id, bs.book_state_name, bm.book_method_id, bm.book_method_name, l.laundry_id, l.laundry_name, bl.book_line_id, bl.book_line_fee, bl.clothes_Id, bl.fabric_Id from book b join book_state bs on b.book_state_id = bs.book_state_id join book_method bm on bm.book_method_id = b.book_method_id join laundry l on l.laundry_id = b.laundry_id join book_line bl on b.book_id = bl.book_id order by book_insert_date desc

select b.book_Id, b.user_id, b.book_Count, b.book_Insert_Date, b.book_Update_Date, b.book_Memo, b.book_Total_Fee, bs.book_state_id, bs.book_state_name, bm.book_method_id, bm.book_method_name, l.laundry_id, l.laundry_name, bl.book_line_id, bl.book_line_fee, bl.clothes_Id, bl.fabric_Id from book b join book_state bs on b.book_state_id = bs.book_state_id join book_method bm on bm.book_method_id = b.book_method_id join laundry l on l.laundry_id = b.laundry_id join book_line bl on b.book_id = bl.book_id where to_char(book_insert_date, 'YYYYMMDD') = #{_parameter} order by book_insert_date desc

select b.*, bs.book_state_name, bl.book_line_id, bl.book_line_fee, bl.clothes_id, bl.fabric_id, l.laundry_name from book b join book_state bs on b.book_state_id = bs.book_state_id join book_line bl on b.book_id = bl.book_id join laundry l on l.laundry_id = b.laundry_id where book_id = #{_parameter}
